alert.note: Alert for Washington (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 14 at 9:40AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...AN AREA OF MODERATE TO HEAVY SNOW SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHEASTERN HARRISON... JEFFERSON...SOUTHWESTERN COLUMBIANA...SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL... SOUTHWESTERN WASHINGTON...OHIO...BROOKE AND HANCOCK COUNTIES... At 940 AM EDT, an area of moderate to heavy snow showers was located in and around Wellsburg, moving southeast at 30 mph. Locations impacted include... Weirton, Steubenville, Wellsburg, West Liberty, Avella, Valley Grove, Toronto, Wintersville, Mingo Junction, Follansbee, Hooverson Heights, and Tiltonsville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in West Virginia between mile markers 12 and 14. Interstate 70 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 0 and 5. Snow will lead to reduced visibilities and hazardous travel conditions. Visibility may drop below one-half mile at times, and untreated roads may become slick. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
